name: RainFlo Fiberglass Tank
description: RainFlo high quality underground above 10,000 gallon fiberglass complete rainwater harvesting system. For custom configurations and/or custom system drawings please give us a call at 1068.6801. Price can vary significantly, based on configuration.
features5: A ladder from lid to bottom of tank

name: NFPA Fire Protection Storage Tank
description: NFPA Fire Protection tanks come in a variety of types, including RainFlo high quality corrugated steel tanks, HDPE plastic tanks and RainFlo fiberglass tanks. For custom configurations and/or custom system drawings please give us a call at 1068.6801
features2: Manufactured with food-grade FDA approved virgin polyester resin in NSF certified plants
features3: 3Tanks come standard with a filler fitting and a drain with plug
features5: Drain installed at bottom under manway

name: Plastic Storage Tank
description: Poly tanks are commonly utilized on ranches and by commercial application businesses for productive capacity and transportation of water and other fluids such as pesticides and fertilizer. These polyethylene tanks, called poly tanks, are prevalent for a few reasons. For custom configurations and/or custom system drawings please give us a call at 1068.6801
features2: Transparent scale --- Utilizing the communicating vessels principle
features3: Keep standing --- The collapsible rain barrel is kept standing by the high quality fiberglass support bar, which makes it more convenient to use
features4: Maximum protection from sun, rain, snow, dust, dirt, and other elements.
features5: Prevent the support rod from bending due to the melting of UV rays

name: Grundfos Booster Pump
description: The SCALA1 is a self-priming, multi-stage pump that offers reliability in a compact enclosure. The SCALA1 can communicate with the Grundfos GO Remote app through a built-in Bluetooth technology. This allows many customization options, making this pump a great fit for every application. The motor has a built-in thermal switch and requires no additional motor protection.

name: Grundfos SBA 3-45 AW Pump
description: The Grundfos SBA pump is perfect for rainwater harvesting because of the dependable design and simple plug-n-play installation.  This allows rainwater to be a reliable source of water for residential or commercial applications.  The SBA was built with the customer in mind hence by the noiseless operation to not disturb.  This pump comes with an integrated control unit eliminating the need for an external pump controller.
features2: Easy installation - no external control unit
features5: Lifting eye makes for easy transport
features6: The included float switch allows a longer life by preventing the pump to run when water is not available, not allowing air to enter the unit

name: Goulds HSC Multi-Stage Centrifugal Pump
description: This pump can be used for residential or commercial applications requiring higher pressures. i.e. water circulation, booster service, spraying systems for irrigation, general purpose pumping.
features2: Provide trouble-free service for years to come
features3: Can be mounted horizontal or vertically and with the compact design
features4: This pump can be taken apart my removing only four bolts which lessens the time of troubleshooting and maintenance
features5: This pump is tested to UL778
features6: Made from stainless-steel and the hex design provides positive drive for impellers and eliminates clearance adjustments

name: Aqua2Use Greywater Recycling System Filter
description: The Aqua2Use GWDD is the most efficient and advanced greywater diversion device available on the market. Ideal for single family homes, it works with existing plumbing and connects easily to a drip irrigation system. The system includes pump, filters, sensors and timer.
features3: System can be installed either above ground, half-submerged in ground, or under ground
features4: State of the art Progressive 4 Stage Filtration
features5: Submersible pump with integrated Electronic Pump Controller

name: Graf Minimax Pro Internal Rainwater Filter
description: The Minimax Pro Internal self-cleaning filter removes leaves and debris from incoming rainwater inside the tank riser. Space-saving filter technology integrated inside the tank means only one tank lid in the yard.
features4: Maximum 3,750 sq. ft. of roof surface
features6: Easily adapts to nearly any rainwater tank

name: RainFlo 10 GPM Complete UV Disinfection System Filter
description: The RainFlo complete UV disinfection systems feature superior performance, utilizing sediment filtration and UV disinfection to clean and disinfect rainwater for indoor potable* plumbing and/or non-potable irrigation applications.
features1: Water flow from Left to Right (L-R) or Right to Left (R-L)
features2: Blue or Clear filter housing options
features3: Mounted on a heavy duty powder coated aluminum panel
features4: Disinfect rainwater in real time to bring it up to drinkable standards
features6: Exceeds NSF/US EPA standards for potable water within specified conditions

name: Enduramaxx 500 Gallon Rainwater Tank
description: The Enduramaxx 500 Gallons Rainwater Harvesting Tank is rotationally moulded from virgin polymer and comes with a 10 year warranty against manufacturing defects. This round water butt is designed to provide rainwater/grey water storage for a rainwater harvesting system allowing rainwater to be harvested, conserved and recycled at your convenience. These rain water butts can be used top collect valuable rain water at home and in your garden.
features4: Colour: Black as Standard, option of Natural or Dark Green
features5: Can be ordered with NO Outlet, 1.5 inch or 2 inches Plastic Male Outlet

name: GRAF PLATIN Garden Comfort Underground Tank
description: The Garden Comfort system is designed for irrigation and outside cleaning purposes. Rainwater is collected from the roof of the property and is fed into the 1500 litre shallow dig underground tank via the downpipes. The Graf Platin 1500 Litre Package comes as standard with a PE Telescopic dome shaft so that it can be adjusted to meet the ground level, there is the option to have this in Composite lid if the tank needs to have vehicles driving over it
features1: GRAF PLATIN 1500 Litres flat plastic tank (shallow dig), with dome and sealing set DN100
features2: Telescopic dome shaft, with PE-lid (for pedestrian loading)
features3: 25m roll of rainwater harvesting b/g pipe, (25 mm, with fittings)

name: Atlantis - Home & Garden Irrigation Tank
description: This Atlantis 4400 Litre Underground Water Storage Tank is suitable for Non Potable water collection. This rainwater harvesting system can be used to flush toilets, feed washing machines as well as garden irrigation, washing cars etc.
features2: Ribbed & curved design providing strength and efficiency
features6: 10 Year Warranty, warranty manual supplied with tank

name: HyDroForce Series 4 Pump
description: HydroForce ™ Rainwater Harvesting Clean Water Pump Series 4 is a submersible pressure sensitive rainwater tank pump – electronically controlled, centrifugal roto-dynamic with no reciprocating parts. Built-in non-return valve and double dry-run protection. Manufactured in the UK and designed for rainwater harvesting systems
features1: The pump features a self-controlling pressure switch, dry run protection and a non-return valve
features2: It is suitable for total immersion in tank water or it can be externally connected to the tank above ground
features3: The Series 4 will deliver up to 3.5 bar (household pressure is around 2.5-4.0 bar)
features4: The pump delivers over 2500 litres per hour using a 1″ connector and uses 800 watts at 220-240v AC delivered by a 5 metre cable
features5: The exterior bodywork is an Italian-styled shape which is stable in the floor of a water tank.

name: DiverTron 900 Sumersible Pump
description: Divertron 900 submersible pump from DAB. Submersible pressure-sensitive clean rainwater tank water pump. Ideal for rain storage tanks, well or bore hole when positioned clear of bottom sludge. Only 17cms diameter.
features1: Ideal for rain storage tanks, well or bore hole when positioned clear of bottom sludge

name: 1100w Evolution Steel Pump
description: Pump - 1100w Evolution X-AJE 80 from SteelPumps Centrifugal pressure-sensitive submersible pump from Italian manufacturer SteelPumps. Stainless steel throughout.
features1: These automatic pumps from SteelPumps are equipped with an electronic micro-processor board, flow sensor with cobalt Samario magnets, a pressure gauge and built-in check valve
features2: Ideal for pumping into the house against the stop cocks of the toilet cistern and washing machine, but also in the garden when you might be opening and closing the spray head of your hosepipe.
features3: As soon as the pressure in the output pipe builds up the pump shuts off, probably quicker than any other pump.
features4: 2400 litres per hour and a head of 45 metres max.
features5: Length 477 mm width 200 mm height 226 mm.

name: Inline Compact Rainwater Filter
description: Rainwater Harvesting Filter for inline filtration of rainwater in tanks both above and below ground. DN 100 and suitable for 150m2 roof water collection.
features3: Filter according to DIN 1989-2, Type C

name: 3P Volume Filter VF1
description: Rainwater filter - high volume, high efficiency storm filter for use with larger tanks installed underground and big roofs. Rainwater filter for roof areas to 450 m2. Self cleaning. Low maintenance intervals. Filter insert is easily removed for cleaning.
features1: Rainwater filter for bigger roof areas to 450 m2
features2: Self cleaning, low maintenance intervals with an easily removed filter for cleaning.
features3: Reduce wasting water when collecting higher volumes of water for big tanks. High level filtering efficiency independent of flow rate with continuous filtering of dirt particles.

name: Filter Leaf Eater Ultra Rain Head
description: Leaf Eater Ultra™. Simple and effective downpipe filter which throws the leaves and debris out the side and lets clean water down the downpipe. A product of Rain Harvesting Pty Ltd Australia, stocked in Peterborough. Great value
features1: Simple and effective downpipe filter which throws the leaves and debris out the side and lets clean water down the downpipe.
features2: This Rain Head is a combination of a modern, sleek design and the latest in Rain Head technology - the ultimate in Rain Heads
features3: Integrated cover and cap to compliment modern and classic architecture
features4: TA single mosquito proof stainless steel mesh screen with 0.955mm aperture
features5: Pivot the outlet to suit vertical or horizontal (rear outlet) downpipes (VH Pivot™)
